xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 8 Tika, Saraṇaduka » 8.18 Atītattika, Saraṇaduka » 8.18.7 Pañhāvāra
Hetu
Tika, Saraṇaduka
Atītattika, Saraṇaduka
Pañhāvāra
Hetu
58.
1882Paccuppanno saraṇo dhammo paccuppannassa saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1883Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  upanissaye tīṇi…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
59.
1884Paccuppanno araṇo dhammo paccuppannassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1885Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  upanissaye tīṇi…pe…  kamme dve…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1886(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
